introCard.text: Our technology simplifies global payroll, compliance and employee management

introText.tagline: We create custom and performant solutions for the new world of work
introText.text: We combine technology and human soft skills in order to facilitate remote employee management by providing guidance on payroll, regulations and benefits in different countries

appBlock.text: Our software simplifies payroll validation, request approvals and other tedious HR tasks by using cutting edge technology stack.

first.header: A virtual workspace for all the team members
first.text: Easily manage your business and employee data from one accessible and secure place.

second.text: Review and validate your payroll in few simple steps and ensure compliance and timeliness

third.text: Submit and validate leave and travel requests, expense claims and questions related to local laws in the destination country using our desktop or mobile solution.

content.text1: IVY teams consist of highly skilled experts in their fields that come from diverse backgrounds and nationalities.
content.text2: We operate in multiple regions, providing local support to help our clients navigate the complexity of international compliance, employment and global recruitment.

approachBlock.header: Get the most with our custom approach
approachBlock.text: Each of our clients has a dedicated point of contact responsible for assisting their needs.

whatWeDoBlock.header: We create custom yet robust solutions for the new world of work
whatWeDoBlock.text: Managing international workforce is a complex task that requires a thorough understanding of local specificities.

partnerProgram.answer: Our platform allows you to  mirror your ecosystem, secures and automatises payroll operations and support the daily administrative tasks of all team members making your clients in confidence.

second.title: Compliance

form.text: We will contact you shortly in order to learn about your unique requirements and provide you with a clear and handcrafted roadmap.

additional.text2: Our team will contact you in order to learn about your unique requirements and provide you with a clear and handcrafted roadmap.

headSection.title: We know what it takes to make your business work abroad
headSection.text: Our teams consist of highly qualified and experienced individuals from diversified backgrounds and nationalities. We use Swiss quality and innovation to help our clients facilitate their business expansion strategy.

expandingSection.location: IVY Solutions is based in Switzerland but operates worldwide
expandingSection.title: Expanding your business abroad can be complicated but it does not have to be that way.
expandingSection.text: IVY helps you through each step of expanding your business abroad whether it is setting up offices, obtaining permits, paying your employee or guaranteeing conformity with country-specific rules.

navigateSection.title: Navigate international HR administrative complexity
navigateSection.text: We help businesses with global expansion and workforce management while assuring compliance with local laws and regulations.

approachSection.text1: We believe that each business has its own unique needs and we strive to serve these needs in the best way possible.
approachSection.text2: User experience is our priority and we work hard everyday to offer intuitive and functional tools to our clients. Our best reward is when we simplify complexity without sacrificing effectiveness.
approachSection.title: Unique approach
approachSection.titleAdditional: We avoid generic solutions and treat each customer with a personal care.

principlesSection.intro: Our mission is to understand our clients' needs and offer the best solution to answer these needs while enjoying the process and having fun when possible. We apply the same principles with our teams.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.text: We are consistently open, honest and ethical, we are delivering our very best in all we do, holding ourselves accountable

performance.title: Performance
performance.text: We constantly provide flexible yet robust and premium solutions to our customers in a timely manner.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.text: We understand unique needs of each of our customers and fight together for their success.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We are finding new ways to make our company better each day.

joinUsSection.title: Join our team
joinUsSection.text: Start your global career journey and help us shape the working environment of tomorrow.

titleBlock.title: Join us
titleBlock.text: We are always looking for talented professionals to work in our team.

textBlock.firstText: We are a highly motivated group of people from diverse backgrounds that enjoys working efficiently and with passion while having fun when possible.
textBlock.secondText: At IVY, we believe in improving an everyday life experience, both through our services and daily interactions.
textBlock.thirdText: Join us if you are passionate about meaningful work that creates an impact.

textBlock2.description: Profit from modern and secure cloud and avoid additional fees and installations.

textBlock3.description: Use our powerful settings to reflect your internal processes and organizational framework.

footer.description: We help businesses with global expansion and workforce management while assuring compliance with local laws and regulations.

textBlock4.title: Costs and benefits
textBlock4.description: Provide different team members with a user-friendly interface to manage all employee related costs in accordance with local compliance.

mobilePage.description: A platform that is accessible in the office or on the go.

textBlock1.description: Receive payroll and requests related notifications on time whether you are in the office or on the go.

textBlock2.title: Request management
textBlock2.description: Allow your team members to submit, track and validate leave, expense, travel, OT and shift requests from their mobile devices.

textBlock3.title: Calendar
textBlock3.description: Have an always accessible and intuitive tool that helps you with employee management and HR planning.

textBlock4.title: Assistance
textBlock4.description: Consult with your dedicated point of contact from IVY if needed.

payrollPage.title: Payroll Management
payrollPage.description: Easy and timely payroll that is compliant to local regulations.

textBlock1.title: Easy payroll
textBlock1.description: Validate payroll for your employees abroad in few simple steps and ensure they are paid on time.

textBlock2.title: Automated reminders
textBlock2.description: Never miss a payroll date by using our automated reminders for each step of the payroll cycle.

textBlock3.title: Built-in compliance
textBlock3.description: Get support from our dedicated team of qualified payroll professionals to resolve any query quickly and efficiently.

textBlock4.title: Data synchronization
textBlock4.description: Avoid duplication of work by having your payroll connected to the other modules of the software.

overviewPage.title: One multifunctional platform
overviewPage.description: A solution that makes life easier for all the team members.

section1.title: Empower employees wherever they are
section1.content: Provide your employees with a practical tool that facilitates their daily tasks and allows them to submit requests on the go using our mobile or desktop solution.

section2.title: Enable managers globally
section2.description: International business is complicated but it does not have to be this way.
section2.content: Give your managers means to monitor their direct reports and to keep the whole team in sync while avoiding extensive email traffic and laborous paperwork.

section3.title: Support HR teams across the borders
section3.description: It makes a difference having a professional that guides you through international administrative complexity.
section3.content: Help your HR teams with international laws and compliance by automatizing tedious HR tasks while profiting from consistent support from IVY professionals.

section4.title: Enhance executives worldwide
section4.description: Make the best of your time and concentrate only on what matters.
section4.content: Give executives a comprehensive data about your organization and related business costs globally keeping total transparency and control in managing their teams.

ivySupportPage.description: Professional guidance for your company to reach its full potential.

textBlock2.description: Let your employees update their own details to complete administrative tasks much faster and accurately.

block1.text1: As data processor, IVY Solutions is compliant with GDPR (General Data Protection Rules) for any personal data that is collected from anywhere in the world to perform our service. We believe that following the rules and regulations inherent to GDPR is key to deliver high class services and that ensuring the corresponding processes are applied allows better safety and security over our clients’ data.
block1.text2: The HR fields are impacted by the GDPR regulation as it contains an important amount of personal data. Through our application (Web and Mobile) and our services, we ensure that we collect only the necessary personal data from our clients. We also select partners that are GDPR compliant and therefore guarantee that our end to end solution is compliant.
block1.text3: Under GDPR, employees have the right to rectify, right to forget, right to object and their data must be available to them in digital format. At IVY Solutions, we have implemented processes that ensures the employees’ rights are respected. We collect only the minimum required data and its accessibility is controlled by the roles and permissions access rights designed in our applications.

block1.text1: IVY Solutions is applying ISO 27001 practices to its organization. The ISO 27001 sets the standards for Information Security Management System in order for an organization to ensure all data and information are under control and follow strict processes.
block1.text2: Being compliant with the standard is the assurance for our clients that IVY Solutions is cautious with its own data and therefore even more with our clients’ data.

block1.text1: IVY solution cloud server provider is SOC 2 compliant. System and Organization Controls (SOC) Reports are independent third-party examination reports that demonstrate how key compliance controls and objectives are achieved.
IVY Solutions attach great importance to protect its user’s data and privacy. This Policy sets out the following:

list1.item1: What information we collect and process;
list1.item3: Who we share this information with;
list1.item4: How we secure your personal data;
list1.item5: How your data protection rights are handled;
list1.item6: How we comply with the data protection rules.

block1.text2: All personal information is collected and processed in accordance with GDPR. As a global company, IVY Solutions works in multiple country outside of EU but nonetheless applies GDPR compliance for all its activity worldwide and impose its suppliers to follow it too.

block2.text1: To perform our service, IVY Solutions is collecting personal information connected to you allowing us to identify our users. To this extent, data spectrum can be:

list1.item1: Name, home address, e-mail address, telephone number, passport or other personal ID card numbers and details, bank account details or other payment details;
list1.item2: Necessary details according to governmental authorities, insurance companies and other mandatory demands;
list1.item3: Information provided by your employer about you (payroll, benefits, planning);
list1.item4: Information on how you use our website and/or App;
list1.item5: The communications you exchange with us or through our applications in any type of form.

block2.title: What personal data we collect

block3.text1: We may process your personal information for the purpose of conducting our services and your date may be used for the following purposes:

list1.item1: Delivering our services to you, your employers or any third party;
list1.item2: Reaching out to you if needed and manage our communication;
list1.item3: Using your banking details for financial transaction connected to your use of our service and detect possible fraud;
list1.item5: Allowing us to keep you informed on IVY Solutions latest insights. You can opt out at any time by updating your preferences.

block3.title: Why we collect these information
block3.text2: Your information is kept for the time necessary to perform our service but not longer. We have to precise that we may need to keep some of the data for legal, administrative or accounting purposes. We destroy the data as per the EU regulation once retention of it is no longer needed.

block4.text1: We may share your personal data for the purpose of conducting our business with :

item1.title: Service providers.
item1.text: Company that are having a lawful business relationship with IVY Solutions and that provide us services to you on our behalf, or that support IVY Solutions in delivering the services to you;

item2.title: Third Parties.
item2.text: Bank, Insurance, tax agencies and other benefit provider for the purpose of delivering our service.

item3.title: Legal requirements.
item3.text: Government, regulators for compliance with legal requirements. Legal and other professional advisers, law courts and law enforcement bodies in all countries we work in.

block4.title: Who we share your data with

block5.text1: IVY Solutions has procedures and policies that follows industry standards on data security and information management to safeguard from data loss, thefts, as well as cyber-attacks. IVY Solutions constantly review its standards and follow latest technological development to ensure best standards are used for its clients.
block5.title: How we secure your personal data

block6.title: Cookies
block6.text1: We use "cookies" on this site. A cookie is a piece of data stored on a site visitor's hard drive to help us improve your access to our site and identify repeat visitors to our site. For instance, when we use a cookie to identify you, you would not have to log in a password more than once, thereby saving time while on our site. Cookies can also enable us to track and target the interests of our users to enhance the experience on our site. Usage of a cookie is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information on our site, you can always disagree with the cookie policy and cookie do not capture any information from your computer.

list1.item1: Request IVY Solutions about information we hold on you and how we are using it;
list1.item2: Lodge a data subject access request so that you can receive a digital copy of all the information we gathered on you;
list1.item3: Lodge a rectification request so that we can update any information on you;
list1.item4: Lodge a forget request so that we would delete all the information on you when there is no reason for us to keep them;
list1.item5: Lodge an object request preventing IVY solution to transfer any of your data to any third party or partners;
list1.item6: If you have any questions on how we handle your information, please feel free to contact our teams:

block7.text1: Under certain circumstances and depending on your location, by law you have the right to:
block7.title: How your data protection rights are handled

block8.title: Changes to privacy policy
block8.text1: Our Privacy Policy may be updated to reflect changes in ur practice. We would provide information on the changes by email and on this webpage.

block1.text1: IVY Solutions SA and its subsidiaries and Affiliate (“IVY Solutions”) provides information and services on its internet site(s), its registered applications (Web and mobile) under the terms and conditions set below and by accessing or using IVY Solutions information and services you accept to bound to it.

block2.text1: The information available on IVY Solutions sites and application is the property of IVY Solutions and by using it, you agree to not violate the rights. The information is protected by copyrights, trademark, rights of confidentiality and privacy and other intellectual property laws. Therefore, unless authorized by IVY Solutions, the users must not copy, download, reproduce, republish, broadcast, transmit, sell, license, create derivative in any possible ways. This information and use of the applications are available via a mobile device, the Internet, and may require software. IVY Solution is not responsible for providing the environment necessary to benefit its information and applications.
block2.title: Intellectual Property
block2.text2: Additionally, the website and applications may contain information from third party libraries, which are binding terms and condition of their owners. See open source library used here (attached the list).

block3.text1: Unless otherwise noted, all materials including without limitation the trademarks, trade names, domain names, logos, service marks, slogans, and other material that appears on our Sites, Applications and Services are registered and/or unregistered Trademarks of either IVY Solutions and/or its affiliates and/or its partners and/or third parties. block3.title: Trademark

block4.text1: Our Sites, Applications and Services may contain links to third party which are not under the area of control of IVY Solutions. We decline responsibilities or liabilities for the content or privacy practices of any such linked websites or any link or linking program at any time. IVY Solution does not imply any endorsement (or related products or services) of the material on our website or unless explicitly said otherwise. If you decide to access any of the third-party websites linked to the Website, you do so entirely at your own risk.
block4.title: Links to Third Party Websites

block5.text1: Access to, and use of, the Sites are subject to all applicable international, federal, state, provincial and local laws and regulations. Use of any Site in violation of any such laws or regulations is strictly prohibited.
block5.title: Compliance with laws and regulations

block6.text1: IVY Solutions Privacy policy is available on the Sites and Applications and is available upon request. By accessing or using the sites and Applications, its users agree with the content of the Privacy Policy.
block6.title: Privacy Policy

block7.text1: IVY Solutions allocate you with a limited, non-transferable, non-sub licensable, non-exclusive right to access and use the hosted Sites, Applications and Services. Nothing is this Terms and Conditions indicates that IVY Solutions should grant you access to Source Code of the Applications, Copy of the Sites or Details on business process for the Services. By accessing IVY Solutions Site or Applications, each User agrees as follows:
block7.title: Customer’s Rights & Responsibility
block7.text2: IVY Solutions will rapidly intervene on any correctly reported malfunction of its Applications or on any reported business failure if foreseen accordingly in the commercial agreement between parties.

list1.item1: User will use the Service to upload, transmit or otherwise distribute any content that is unlawful, defamatory, harassing, abusive, fraudulent, obscene, threatening, abusive, hateful, contains viruses, or is otherwise objectionable as reasonably determined by IVY Solutions;
list1.item2: User will not use the Service for any fraudulent or inappropriate purpose;

list1.item4: User will not decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble or unlawfully use or reproduce any of the software, copyrighted or trademarked material, trade secrets, or other proprietary information contained in any Site;
list1.item5: User acknowledges that portions of the Sites are restricted and may only be accessed by authorized users, including portions which are password protected.  User agrees to access only those portions of the Sites to which IVY Solutions has expressly granted access.  User acknowledges that unauthorized access to such restricted areas is strictly prohibited and may lead to criminal prosecution.

block8.text1: IVY Solutions do not guarantee that information provided on the website is up to date and information contained in such postings may have been superseded. IVY Solution assume no liability or responsibility for any errors or omissions in the information provided on the Website. The use of the Website is at your own risk.
